content.text:
# Gratias Agit Award

The Gratias Agit Award () is an annual recognition awarded by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Czech Republic "for the promotion of the good name of the Czech Republic abroad". It was established in 1997 and awards presentations have generally been conducted at the Czernin Palace.
Notable recipients of the award include Leszek Engelking, Patrick Herminie, Martina Sablikova, Jiri Belohlavek, and Norodom Sihamoni.
